Even after admission to the Institute if an applicant is at a later date found ineligible on account of supplying false information of false testimonials or for having suppressed any material information, his / her admission will be cancelled and the fee paid will also be forfeited.Age Limit for Admission to Diploma Courses25 years for General / PH and 28 years for SC / BC candidates as on 1.7.2014. Candidates belonging to General and Physically Handicapped Categories whose date of birth falls on or after 1.7.1989 are eligible. In the case of Scheduled Caste and Backward Class candidates, upper age limit is relax-able by 3 years. For those two categories (SC & BC) candidates born on or after 1.7.1986 will be eligible. Date of birth as recorded in the Secondary Education Board / Pre-University Certificate is the only authentic proof that will be accepted. At the time of interview, this certificate must be produced in original as a proof of age failing which the candidate will not be considered for interview.
